comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content:
Pilot : George Beatty    Aero Club of America Pilot # 41  August 4, 1911
Nassau Boulevard Aerodrome, Garden City, Long Island , New York
Aircraft type Burgess - Wright model B built under contract with Wright Brothers by  W. Starling Burgess.( Aero Club of America Pilot # 136  June 15, 1912)
Notice Burgess name on hangar behind aircraft.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Early Aviaton:  Thanks for pointing us to Beatty's correct first name, and for the additional information!
